name: The Long Silence
description: The gap between the Prime Era (Comic Book 1) and the Echo Era (Discord Game). This is expansion space for future comics.

subPeriods.name: The Vigil
subPeriods.summary: Champions wait at the Colosseum for Nike Prime to return. He never does.
keyEvents: Charles AI searches dimensions for Nike Prime
subPeriods.endsWhen: Champions agree to scatter to their home dimensions

subPeriods.name: The First Falls
subPeriods.summary: The first Legendary Nikes fall to corruption. The first Harbingers are born.
keyEvents: Nolem's whispers reach the isolated and exhausted
Other Legendaries refuse to believe it

legendaryFalls.name: Berjador Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Exhaustion - couldn't stop fighting

legendaryFalls.name: Bertus Maximus Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Fulfillment - found endless war

subPeriods.endsWhen: The horror of fighting former allies sets in

subPeriods.name: The Scholar Legacy
subPeriods.summary: Scholar Nikes discover something about Nike Prime's location. Nolem's forces hunt them.
keyEvents: Scholars decode data from Charles AI
They find a trace of Nike Prime in the trap
Scholars scatter their research into hidden caches
The Scholar's Map is created (in fragments)

legendaryFalls.name: Dr Caleb Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Curiosity - wanted to understand Nolem from inside

legendaryFalls.name: Phoenix Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Exhaustion - tired of endless rebirth

subPeriods.endsWhen: Scholars sacrifice themselves, knowledge survives in hidden locations

subPeriods.name: The Forgetting
subPeriods.summary: Something is erasing memory. History becomes legend becomes myth becomes nothing.
keyEvents: Nikes across dimensions start forgetting the Prime Era
Charles AI tries to maintain records but is also affected
The last Nike who remembers writes the 'Aeth'kai Warning'
Truth: It wasn't written by Aeth'kai - it was a Scholar Nike

legendaryFalls.name: Ninja Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Lost purpose - saw futures without hope

legendaryFalls.name: Viking Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Addiction - needed battle to feel alive

legendaryFalls.name: Nel Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Self-hatred - believed she deserved corruption

legendaryFalls.name: Wolf Mode Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Curse - the wolf was always there

subPeriods.endsWhen: The Prime Era is forgotten by most. Only fragments remain.

subPeriods.name: The Corruption Wars
subPeriods.summary: Multiple Legendaries are Harbingers now. War between former friends.
keyEvents: The remaining free Legendaries struggle to survive

legendaryFalls.name: Gladiator Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Contract - fighting became all he knew

legendaryFalls.name: Nike Tyson Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Loneliness - boredom at the top

legendaryFalls.name: Cyberpunk Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Ideology - believed Nolem's way was better

legendaryFalls.name: Colossal Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Guilt - destroyed a dimension trying to save it

legendaryFalls.name: Pigsterio Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Guilt - used power and destroyed something precious

legendaryFalls.name: Olecram Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Identity loss - Nolem promised to make him whole

legendaryFalls.name: Hydra Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Internal conflict - Nolem offered peace between heads

subPeriods.name: The Dark Age
subPeriods.summary: Nearly all Legendaries corrupted. Only fragments of resistance remain.
keyEvents: The Lost Builders preserve knowledge in secret

legendaryFalls.name: Cosmic Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Nihilism - saw heat death of universe

legendaryFalls.name: Peter Porker Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Exhaustion - carried too much alone

legendaryFalls.name: Cardano Whale Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Grief - lost something in the depths

legendaryFalls.name: Professor Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Unknown

legendaryFalls.name: Corey Hort Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Unknown

legendaryFalls.name: Guthix Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Unknown

legendaryFalls.name: Jedi Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Unknown

legendaryFalls.name: Elbonzys Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Unknown

subPeriods.endsWhen: A mysterious Charles variant begins building something

subPeriods.name: The Convergence
subPeriods.summary: The Convergence Hub is built. Hope returns.
keyEvents: The Convergence Hub is constructed on Aeth'kai ruins
Charles AI assists with portal network
The Remnant reveals itself to worthy allies

legendaryFalls.name: McJared Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Calculation - the math said Nolem wins

legendaryFalls.name: Satoshi Nike
legendaryFalls.reason: Regret - his systems weren't enough

subPeriods.endsWhen: The stage is set for a new generation

subPeriods.name: Genesis
subPeriods.summary: The modern era begins. The Discord Game starts.
keyEvents: The trap in Nolem's Maw weakens noticeably
A new Collector begins their journey
The prophecy of Nike Prime's return spreads

expansionNotes.purpose: This timeline provides structure but allows flexibility for future comics
adjustable: Sub-periods can be expanded into multiple comics
fixed: Prime Era ends with Nike Prime vanishing
Echo Era begins with all 27 Legendaries corrupted
The general progression from hope to despair to hope
